Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL EMPLOYEES

Title: Grants retroactive membership with Tier IV status in the New York state teachers' retirement system to Peter Guarino
Summary: Grants Peter Guarino retroactive membership with Tier IV status in the New York state teachers' retirement system.
ActClause: AN ACT granting retroactive membership with Tier IV status in the New York state teachers' retirement system to Peter Guarino
